title: Deportivo Chiantla
text:
Deportivo Chiantla is a <a href="Guatemala">Guatemalan</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club from <a href="Chiantla">Chiantla</a>, <a href="Huehuetenango%20Department">Huehuetenango Department</a>. It was founded on 1980. It currently plays in the <a href="Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n%20de%20Ascenso">Primera División de Ascenso</a>, the second tier of Guatemalan football.
History.
The team began playing at amateur leagues having a great progress gaining more supporters and sponsors. In 1992 it achieved the professional status after being promoted to Liga mayor B today known as the second tier <a href="Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n%20de%20Ascenso">Primera División de Ascenso</a>. In the 2017/18 they gained promotion to the <a href="Liga%20Nacional%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol%20de%20Guatemala">Liga Nacional de Fútbol de Guatemala</a> for the first time ever.
